Some first ideas:


## why are open technologies relevant to the aid industry?

* gratis
* customisable
* vendor independence:
  - continuity
  - platform independence
* no suspicion of special interests (e.g. Microsoft etc.)


## specific examples

* ODK / KoBo Toolbox
* Cloud document editing
* cryptocurrencies
* OpenStreetMap
